4309170.name: Songtail: Whiskers of Destiny Demo
4309170.description:
Songtail: Whiskers of Destiny is a narrative-driven rhythm game about investigation, preparation, and performance.

Play the ultimate bard fantasy:

Investigation Before Performance

  • Explore elegant court spaces, talk to suspicious guests, and uncover subtle clues — sometimes by being clever, sometimes by being a cat.

  • Choices That Shape the Song

    Select verses that hint at secrets you’ve discovered. Your lyrics influence how the court perceives your performance.

  • Narrative Rhythm Gameplay

    Perform songs where timing, accuracy, and preparation shape the outcome.

  • A Stylish Fantasy World

    Whimsical characters, polished pixel art, and a court where etiquette is just another mask.
